overview_subtitle: Everything you need to deploy, configure, and manage your self-hosted productivity suite.
card_quickstart_desc: From zero to a running stack in 3 commands. Takes about 5 minutes.
card_first_login_desc: Create an admin account, log into every app, and understand the SSO flow.
card_rbac_desc: Define groups once, have permissions auto-propagate everywhere. The core feature.
card_add_users_desc: Step-by-step: create users, assign them to groups, watch access appear across apps.
card_helm_desc: Deploy on Kubernetes with the Klyvra Helm chart. Declarative RBAC in values.yaml.
card_custom_domain_desc: Move from localhost to a real domain with automatic HTTPS via Let's Encrypt.
card_architecture_desc: Hub-and-spoke SSO, adapters, blueprints, and how the pieces fit together.
card_troubleshooting_desc: Common issues and how to fix them: ports, DNS, SSO, and more.
